content: aleta means little winged one and is designed for the 2022bamcal on ravelry this is a 10 inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook approx 127 m/ 139 yards of yarn needed you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colours scheme which are listed in the seperate pdf as well as the yarn amounts per round used the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and pistachio if you want to see more of my work please vist my facebook page https //www facebook com/something-crochet-1875698805791418/ happy hooking
